val:
Substrate is blockchain framework that makes developer build their own blockchain easily. All of the Polkadot/Kusama parachains are built based on Substrate, which make networks multi-chain platform.

One of the reason that Substrate makes build blockchain flexible is FRAME, an acronym for Framework for Runtime Aggregation of Modularized Entities. Here, we can see there is a word Aggregation meaning there are several modules for Runtime, which called Pallets that are hosting domain-specific logic.
